attributes.action: Allow nurseries and early years education to close during national lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Make the rules all the same for all education during national lockdown, not one set of rules for early years, nurseries, childcare and another set for schools, colleges and universities.
attributes.background: I want the same rights to closure in early years, childcare, nurseries and alternative education provisions as all other education in national lockdown, protect the teachers in the early years profession as you have teachers in schools, colleges and universities.
